attributes.action: consider amongst other green issues that continuing unrestrained population growth must be the most unsustainable global strategy that exists today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The initiatives to address global warming are laudable and are to be applauded, but it appears that population growth does not feature in any of the agenda.  Unrestrained growth in population world wide must be unsustainable.  This government is urged to promote this in it’s efforts to influence international action to move towards a sustainable manner of living.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
